articles.author: Jennifer Sor
articles.title: 'Sell America' has sparked a FOMO-fueled rush to gold and silver among everyday investors - Business Insider
articles.description: Precious metals markets saw record inflows in 2025, with investors reacting to US economic volatility, tariffs, and "Sell America" sentiment.
articles.content:
Jeremy Cerza, a 45-year-old retail investor, admits he isn't that experienced in markets, but even he knows metals stole the show in 2025.
Gold and silver were among the best-performing investments … [+6141 chars]

articles.title: Heart disease deaths declined. And here's how to reduce your risk of the #1 killer - NPR
articles.description: An annual report from the American Heart Association shows deaths from heart disease and stroke are down, encouraging news after the rate went up in the early years of the pandemic.
articles.content: About every 34 seconds, someone, somewhere in the United States dies from heart disease which remains the leading cause of death for both men and women, according to the American Heart Association. B… [+4145 chars]
